context.summary: Conversation with someone offering networking introductions and connections. Alexis asked if they know anyone at Ramp, they requested a call first before making intros. Previous context shows they're a connector helping with fundraising and design partner introductions, have suggested VCs like Yoran Beisher, Christoph Janz, and David Peterson in the past.

pendingActions.action: Follow up with +14159699735 about Ramp connection

recentMessages.text: No problem. I'll circle back another time. If you change your mind and want to do a quick 5 minute call, just say the word.

Totally fair. I can only check my network after a quick call. If you don't want intros yet, that's fine, the call is just to confirm context and get permission to peek. Want to do a 5 minute call now, or pick a time?
I don't want you to introduce me yet. Just tell me if you have someone from Ramp in your network
We'll need a quick call before I can make intros. Want to do that now, or pick a time?
I can take a look. Quick note: I only make intros after a brief call, but I can check who I know at Ramp and line things up. One sec while I scan my network.
Do you have anyone in your network that works at Ramp

From what I have so far: your name is Alexis (Lex) Vincent, email is alexis@kepler16.com, and your LinkedIn is https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAACa7dWgB-g7gCyHUt5WT2rTCJ-VwIuxRd-A. You're raising funds and looking for design partners to validate an idea, with interest across SaaS and AI. We haven't had a full call yet, so that's the high level. Anything you'd add or correct?
What do you know about me
